entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 10:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: NNE 33 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing near noon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
